name: Betula leaves
description: These leaves are held together by the small but strong twigs they are attached to.

name: Pile of pine needles
description: Be careful not to be poked by those long, thin needles.

name: Letter
description: Adressed to: Ronald, Moeston

name: Niel's Fishing Rod
description: This rod looks old but good enough to catch some fish.

name: Wild Rose
description: A beautifully smelling rose.

name: Researcher's Realizations
description: This book seems to contain many of Ronald's research insights. You don't understand what any of these mean.

name: Scorpion Shell
description: A hard shell of a black reaper

name: Web feather
description: Cobweb sticks easily to this type of feather.

name: Stukka's healing potion
description: The color seems slightly brighter than regular healing potions. It has a faint smell of strawberries.
